paramInformation.label: LED Normal Color
paramInformation.description: Set the LED color when in normal mode

paramInformation.label: LED Status Color
paramInformation.description: Set the LED color when in status mode

paramInformation.label: LED Blink Frequency
paramInformation.description: Set the blink frequency for the LED in status mode

metadata.inclusion: In rapid succession, tap the bottom paddle 2 times, then press & hold the bottom paddle.
metadata.exclusion: In rapid succession, tap the bottom paddle 2 times, then press & hold the bottom paddle.
metadata.reset: In rapid succession, tap the top paddle 3 times, then tap the bottom paddle 3 times. If the LED blinks magenta 3 times, factory reset was successful. If not, repeat this procedure.
